name: After Conversion Ruleset
description: This allows us to fix the issues in a prioritized order.

rules.justification: Do not assign a text to a target with smaller size. POTENTIAL RUNTIME ERROR.
The CalcDate should only be used with DataFormula variables. Alternatively the string should be enclosed using the <> symbols. POTENTIAL RUNTIME ERROR.
Field '{0}' is not specified as a source expression on page '{1}'. All fields specified in ODataKeyFields must be used as the source expression in a page control. POTENTIAL RUNTIME ERROR.
Sorting field '{0}' should be part of the keys for table '{1}'. PERFORMANCE.
Use Get(), FindFirst() and FindLast() without Next() method. PERFORMANCE
The FindSet() or Find() methods must be used only in connection with the Next() method. PERFORMANCE
The FlowField of a table should be indexed. PERFORMANCE. The CodeAnalyzer has a problem.
Avoid non-indexed fields into filtering. PERFORMANCE
Variables must be initialized before usage. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED. The CodeAnalyzer has a problem with TransferFields.
Do not write code that will never be hit. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED.
Do not write code that will never be hit. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED. We have one case.
Pages and reports should use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED.
The value assigned to a variable must be used. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED.
Do not use identical names for parameters and global variables. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED.
Do not use identical names for local and global variables. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED.
Do not declare variables that are unused. SHOULD BE INVESTIGATED.
Variable declarations should be ordered by type. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
The local method must be used; otherwise removed. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
Function calls should have parenthesis even if they do not have any parameters. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
TextConst and Label variable names should have an approved suffix. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
Follow the style guide about the best practices for naming. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
Placeholders should have a comment explaining their content. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
The name of temporary variable must be prefixed with Temp. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
To avoid confusion, do not give local variables the same name as fields, methods, or actions in the same scope. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
Use all lowercase letters for reserved language keywords. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
The END, IF, REPEAT, UNTIL, FOR, WHILE, and CASE statement should always start a line. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
To avoid confusion, do not give methods the same name as fields or actions in the same scope. IMPROVE CODE READABILITY.
When ApplicationArea is set to 'Basic', you must also specify 'Suite'. BEST PRACTICES.
The multilanguage syntax is being deprecated. Please update to the new syntax. BEST PRACTICES.
You must specify a caption in the Caption property for Fields that exist on page objects. BEST PRACTICES.
The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name. BEST PRACTICES.
You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects. BEST PRACTICES.
Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo. BEST PRACTICES.
Add PromotedOnly=true to some or all promoted actions to avoid identical actions from appearing in both the promoted and default sections of the command bar. BEST PRACTICES.
Use camel case property values in pages of type API. BEST PRACTICES.
Use camel case name for field controls in pages of type API. BEST PRACTICES.
AppSourceCop Error. An affix is required. INVESTIGATE IF NEEDED IN YOUR PROJECT.
You must specify a OptionCaption property for all fields which source expressions is not a table field.
Use of implicit 'with' will be removed in the future. Qualify with '{0}'.
